data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Valandovo.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valandovo, North Macedonia

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Valandovo, North Macedonia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Valandovo, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Valandovo, North Macedonia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Valandovo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Albanian, Macedonian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please give the 8 believers in the state of Valandovo the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Valandovo. Through your servants plant 9 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Valandovo, North Macedonia has a population of 4,500.

We estimate Valandovo has 8 people who might know Jesus, 2,781 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,711 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 562 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Valandovo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
